text: #AskBQ is BloombergQuint’s daily offering where market experts help investors make the right investment choice in the equity market.On Thurday’s episode, Jay Thakkar of Anand Rathi and Avinash Gorakshakar of Joindre Capital Services gave their views on BHEL, L&T Finance, GVK Power and much more.
title: How To Play BHEL, L&T; Finance, GVK Power? #AskBQ
